content: cat-fish house created by kaitlyn r modeling by rose and ru materials 4 mm cotton cord 5 5 mm hook 8 inch flower decorating hoop key slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single chain increase= increase dcr = single_crochet decrease chain = chain half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet blo = back loop only a few notes - this pattern is done in a spiral so you won t need to connect row after row 1 - the front of the house should be cone shaped rather than flat you can adjust the pattern as needed for thicker/thinner cord larger/smaller hoop or different gauges as long as you re forming a cone if it looks flat or wavy unwind and take out some stitches - the increases and decreases are staggered to avoid forming any lines that means that the row with an even number of single chains will start with half the single_crochet s before the first increase/dcr ie if there are 12 single_crochet between each increase you ll start the row with six single_crochet then increase and then finish the row with another six single_crochet - use an invisible increase and decrease to avoid unsightly lines - the entire body is done using single chain only the tail and fins are made using half_double_crochet in the back loop only to create the ridged appearance body row 1 slip_stitch on hook single_crochet 66 around hoop slip_stitch into first stitch = 66 row 2 ch1 single_crochet 5 increase single_crochet 10 increase x 5 single_crochet 5 = 72 row 3 single_crochet 11 increase x 6 = 78 row 4 single_crochet 6 increase single_crochet 12 increase x 5 single_crochet 6= 84 row 5 single_crochet 13 increase x 6 = 90 row 6 single_crochet 7 increase single_crochet 14 increase x 5 single_crochet 7 = 96 row 7 single_crochet 15 increase x 6 = 102 row 8 single_crochet 8 single_crochet 15 increase x 5 sc8 = 108 row 9-25 single_crochet all the way around = 108 row 26 sc8 dcr sc16 dcr x5 sc8 = 102 row 27 single_crochet all the way around row 28 sc15 dcr x 6 = 96 row 29 single_crochet all the way around = 96 row 30 sc7 dcr sc14 dcr x5 sc7 = 90 row 31 single_crochet all the way around = 90 row 32 single_crochet 4 dcr sc8 dcr x8 sc4 = 81 row 33 single_crochet all the way around = 81 row 34 single_crochet 7 dcr x9 =72 row 35 single_crochet 3 dcr sc6 dcr x8 sc3 = 63 row 36 single_crochet all the way around = 63 row 37 single_crochet 5 dcr x9 =54 row 38 single_crochet all the way around = 54 row 39 single_crochet 2 dcr sc4 dcr x8 sc2 = 45 row 40 single_crochet all the way around = 45 row 41 single_crochet 3 dcr x 9 = 36 row 42-43 single_crochet all the way around = 36 row 44 single_crochet 1 dcr sc2 dcr x8 sc2 = 27 row 45 single_crochet all the way around
